code: import axios from"axios";var API_URL="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API,"/login/");var register=function register(email,username,icon,password,hcaptchaToken,otp){return axios.post(API_URL+"register/account",{email:email,username:username,icon:icon,password:password,captcha:hcaptchaToken,otp:otp});};var login=function login(email,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"login/account",{username:email,password:password}).then(function(response){if(response.data.code!=200){throw new Error();}else{localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(response.data));console.log(response);}return response;});};var logout=function logout(){localStorage.removeItem("user");};export default{register:register,login:login,logout:logout};
